messages.subject: california/ surfing families?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone I m coming to the biggest list to ask for some input on this.  My dh and I are considering moving from Florida to California.  I would like to hear
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone

I'm coming to the biggest list to ask for some input on this. My dh
and I are considering moving from Florida to California. I would
like to hear from anyone who lives in California and unschools, where
in California do you live and what do you feel your area offers to
your unschooling/surfing lifestyle. We both work in healthcare and
could get a travel assignment for three months at a time but I would
like some idea for areas to try for with the agencies.

TIA for any input

Cheryl
